contentrichtext.text: {{Notability|date=January 2011}} '''Intertex Data AB''' was founded in 1982 by Karl-Erik StÃ¥hl. The company design and manufactures various types of [[modem]]s and [[ADSL]] modems with built-in [[firewall (networking)|firewall]] and [[Router (computing)|router]]. The products have full support for SIP based multimedia real-time communication, and includes [[Session Border Controller]] (SBC), SIP Proxy, SIP Registrar and [[IP PBX]] functionality. The modems are also sold under the brand PowerBit and SurfinBird. In the fall of 2012, Intertex was merged with the group company [[Ingate Systems]]. ==See also== * [[modem]] * [[List of Swedish companies]] ==External links== * [http://www.intertex.se Intertex] - Official site * [http://internetplus.ingate.com/ Internet+, A Model for Global Unified Communication website] [[Category:Companies established in 1982]] [[Category:Companies of Sweden]]
